query.name: queue-pending-message
query.comment: Get the messages which have been queued on a given message queue
query.sql: SELECT m.id, m.version, m.message_type, m.priority, m.server_id, m.task_id, m.parameters, m.create_date, m.processing_date, m.finish_date, m.status, m.user_id, m.session_id, m.queue_id FROM awa_message AS m WHERE m.status = 0 AND m.queue_id = :queue ORDER BY m.priority DESC, m.id ASC LIMIT :max
